DOC.brief_title: Immediate v . Delayed Insertion Copper T 380A IUD After Termination Pregnancy Over 12-weeks Gestation
DOC.detailed_description: Patients present ParkMed Women 's Clinic Reproductive Choice clinic Bellevue Hospital second trimester termination offer participation study . They randomize either delayed immediate Copper T 380A IUD insertion . The subject see 6 month follow-up visit Copper T 380A IUD placement verify physical exam . At 6 month follow-up visit , subject fill satisfaction questionnaire .
